PAGE FIVE: Advertisements
(This space has been designated for advertisements from the Boosters of The Observer. It is through their financial support that our writers are able to focus their time on writing for the paper. Any guild or House that wishes to become a Booster is encouraged to write Valentin Forza.)
===The Observer Boosters=== ------------------------------------------------------------------------- ---The Forza Family--- The family-style guild responsible for the Triskellian Combat League and The Observer is looking to hire more help! The TCL is looking to hire Event Organizers, Security and more Fighters; The Observer is looking to hire Security and more Writers! The Forza Family prides itself on Loyalty, Pride and Excellence, so consider those values prerequisites for application to these positions. Contact Valentin Forza for application details.
The Forza Family is also pleased to announce that after some difficulty, we now have enough fancy materials to handle larger jeweling orders. The Family's own miss Dazrene is Docktown's -only- Master Jeweler! Thus, she is able to fashion the most delicate and complicated pieces that are rivaled by -none- in this city. We are particularly excited by the recent arrival of: pure white gold, antique rose gold, violet-hued hepatizon and decorative matte hepatizon! These new arrivals compliment our present inventory of other precious metals and gemstones! Contact missus Dazrene Forza today to arrange a special gift for yourself or someone else! -------------------------------------------------------------------------
